doc.title: Moses Taite's War
doc.plot: It's the 1880's in Kansas, and a rancher Moses Taite and his two ranch hands have to travel to the other side of the world to save their herd and therefore their entire livelihood from being wiped out by disease. Moses Taite and his men journey to India in this Poignant "Eastern Western" and find out the true meaning of being ' fish out of water '
